accelerator:PotentialOrb.NAME: Сфера Потенциальности
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, increases it's #yPotency by #g
when #yEvoked. NL Value shown in #gGreen is affected by #yFocus.

accelerator:KineticOrb.NAME: Сфера Кинетики
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, decreases it's #yPotency by #g1/
when #yEvoked. NL Value shown in #gGreen is affected by #yFocus.
At the start of every turn, decreases it's #yPotency to #r0. Deals #b

accelerator:MagneticOrb.NAME: Сфера Магнитности
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, increases it's #yPotency by #b
for every #yMagnetic Orb currently chanelled. When #yEvoked, Gain #b
#yBlock and if the next Orb is #yMagnetic, #yEvoke it too. NL Not affected by #yFocus.

accelerator:ThermalOrb.NAME: Сфера Термальности
DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, swaps it's position with the orb in front of it. If it was another #yThermal Orb, increase Potency by #g
#yDamage to #rALL #renemies when #yEvoked. NL Value shown in #gGreen is affected by #yFocus.

accelerator:NuclearOrb.NAME: Сфера Ядерности
DESCRIPTION: #yDamage to #ra #rrandom #renemy and #yChannels #b2 #yNuclear Orbs with half the Potency. NL Not affected by damage modifiers. NL Not affected by #yFocus.
